practiceAreas: Personal Injury|Car Accidents|Wrongful Death|Motorcycle Accidents|Truck Accidents|Slip and Fall|Dog Bites
description:
At The May Firm in Bakersfield, California, our results speak for themselves. In motor vehicle accidents, dog bites, wrongful death and other personal injury cases, our attorneys consistently return large-sum awards on behalf of clients. We strive to bring matters to a close through negotiating a fair settlement, but the team at our law offices is prepared to go to trial when necessary. Together, we have secured more than $44 million for victims of negligence.

Starting with a free initial consultation at one of our seven law offices, we use our knowledge and experience to build the strongest possible case. In one of our most notable successes, we recovered a $2.5 million award for a client who suffered neck and back pain in a slip-and-fall incident. When several people suffered injuries following a car accident, our attorneys obtained $2.3 million.

These are just a few of the reasons that the team at our law offices is known throughout the legal community. We are members of the prestigious Million Dollar Advocates Forum and Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forum. Even more significant are the relationships we form with our clients. We have built our practice on treating people as though they are our own family, fully investing our time and resources into their case. The May Firm accepts credit cards and serves clients in Ventura, Fresno, Santa Maria, San Luis Obispo, San Diego and Santa Barbara.
